bar_intro: Good evening, madam. Can I interest you in a drink?
club_1: Stone cold sober but your game is on point.
club_4: YEAHHH!!! You've got your buzz on.
club_5: ...and you're more likely to take a risk...
club_9: You're now 5 times more likely to crash...
club_12: Oh look... you've chundered everywhere. Nice.
club_13: You're now 10 times more likely to crash...

tag_line: Maybe madam would like something a little fancier?
first_line: drink a flute of champagne in the first 90 minutes.
every_line: half a glass every hour after that.

first_line: drink 1 full strength middy in 75 minutes.
every_line: 1 full strength middy every 75 minutes after that.

tag_line: It’s a good day for a pint.
first_line: drink half a full strength pint in the first 75 minutes.
every_line: 1 full strength middy every 75 minutes after that.

first_line: drink a standard glass of red wine in the first 90 minutes.
every_line: a standard glass every 90 minutes after that.

first_line: drink 1 nips or shots of spirits in the first hour.

tag_line: I’ve got a lovely crisp white.
first_line: drink a standard glass of white wine in the first 90 minutes.
every_line: a standard glass every 90 minutes after that.
